Entries.Emily: I hope you find lots of eggs today! The kids painted some specially for you!

Entries.spring_1201: I'm painting a chicken on this one! It's for Uncle Shane.$1
Entries.spring_1202: What's your favourite color, farmer @? Mine's green! But I really like purple too...$1
Entries.spring_1203: Oh no! I dripped some paint on my dress.$3

Entries.spring_1201: I'm painting the whole rainbow on this one!$1
Entries.spring_1202: Oops! Mom's gonna be so mad! I got paint on my clothes.$3
Entries.spring_1203: Check out my egg, farmer @! Do you like it?

Entries.schoolday.004: We're going to paint eggs today Dad! Look for mine tomorrow. They'll have birds on them, instead of in them!
Entries.spring_1201: I've been trying to get Mr. Clint to tell me stuff. But he doesn't seem to want to talk.
Entries.spring_1202: Mr. Clint's egg is real pretty. Can you tell him, farmer @? He won't believe me.$3
Entries.spring_1203: Do you like my egg, farmer @? I tried to paint a pelican, but it came out all wrong.$2

Entries.spring_1201: I'm not even sure why I'm here... But Emily asked.$2
Entries.spring_1202: This egg's such a mess... I'm no artist.$2
Entries.spring_1203: *sighs* I was trying to paint a special egg for Emily... but it looks terrible. She's not going to want it.$2

Entries.spring_1201: Ellie really asks a lot of questions, doesn't she?$2
Entries.spring_1202: *sighs* I was trying to paint a special egg for Emily... but it looks terrible. She's not going to want it.$2
Entries.spring_1203: I'm not even sure why I'm here... But Emily asked.$2

Entries.spring_1201: Oh, that egg's so pretty Vincent! So colorful! And Shane's going to love yours, Jas.$1
Entries.spring_1202: I don't think Clint's very happy. Maybe I shouldn't have invited him... but he needs to make friends.$2
Entries.spring_1203: I like to decorate eggs with people in mind. Do you think these colors capture the essence of Haley?

Entries.spring_1201: It's nice to be able to relax from teaching and express my creativity.$1
Entries.spring_1202: Do you think these colors go well together? No? I'm not sure either.$2
Entries.spring_1203: I hope people find my eggs tomorrow! I wouldn't want for them to go rotten.

Entries.spring_1201: *yawns* Emily woke me up early for this? Well, I suppose it's kind of fun.
Entries.spring_1202: I've been working on this egg all morning, @. Silly, isn't it? But I want it to be perfect.$1
Entries.spring_1203: Why wouldn't I help my sister out? Besides, this is actually really fun.$1
